ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling doesnt mean L50 + rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I forgot to mention one important thing that keeps me playing. I like those large barbarian breasts; I don t get to see those when I m on irc.  Plus it
ygData.messageBody:
> one that feels that way. And I agree, when I get to those levels, I'm
> going to be annoyed that the game has gotten boring. However, that does
> not change my assertion, that when I get bored playing the game, I
> will *stop* playing the game.

I forgot to mention one important thing that keeps me playing.

I like those large barbarian breasts; I don't get to see those
when I'm on irc. Plus it helps to be dating one in-game. I just
invite her to the planes a lot, so I can see her nekkid more ;-)

That alone is worth 10 bux a month, I must note. Although, if you'd
ask my girlfriend she'd disagree. Can't please everybody <g>

Harmonic.
